tmf3jr.images

Class BitmapGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • tmf3jr.images.BitmapGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JuliaBitmapGenerator

    public abstract class BitmapGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generate a bitmap in specified size. This class also has functionality of event notification on start or complete a bitmap generation via BitmapGeneratorListener interface. This class is abstract, so sub classes have to override generateBitmap(int[]) method.
